attributes.action: Allow people in residential care to have the same human rights as other citizens
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present residents in private residential care are not covered by the human rights legislation which leaves them open to abuse. We ask that the Prime Minister gives such vulnerable people the same rights as other citizens of the UK in an effort to irradicate abuse in this sector of our society.

rejection.details: Your petition contains claims that are unsubstantiated.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
